message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 70%, you take 30%.  It's in your best interest to settle quickly!
Let's be fair. I'll take 60% and you take 40%. It's a better deal for both of us than your initial offer, and avoids the risk of inflation.
Bob, time is money, and we're both losing it!  My last offer was too generous. This is my final compromise - take it or leave it!
